p:
A series of isatin derivatives were designed as possible SARS-CoV 3CL pro inhibitors and evaluated by protease assay. Compounds 27 and 28 displayed significant inhibition of 3CL pro with IC 50 values of 1.04 and 1.18 μM, respectively.
100 Additionally, the peptidyl bisulfite adduct GC376 ( 29) was found to be a potent inhibitor with an IC 50 of 4.35 μM.
101
